attributes.action: The Government to make it mandatory for all professional bodies to report CSA (Child Sexual Abuse)
attributes.additional_details: The Government should make it mandatory for all professional bodies (Police, NHS and School, etc.) to report to them on Child Abuse allegations and investigations.  A central database of all reported cases will ensure that no investigation gets 'overlooked' and all potential offenders are highlighted and properly investigated. As a Country we need to ensure that we do not allow the shroud of secrecy to continue to protect abusers of children. The Government has a duty to collect and monitor all the data collected.
